Hello,

about.subtitle: I pursue frontend development with scalability and stability in mind.
about.description: I value user-centered web experiences. I aim for collaborative, well-structured, and scalable code, and prioritize service stability and sustainable operations.

about.subtitle: I solve problems together with the team.
about.description: I don't stop at implementing features. I actively engage in resolving conflicts and aligning goals during collaboration. Even in constrained environments, I focus on finding the best possible direction with the team.

about.subtitle: I enjoy new challenges.
about.description: Based on experience across diverse projects, I continue to grow by taking on new technical challenges such as real-time communication services, 3D editing tools, and multi-platform web games.
